TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
sugar or no sugar?

More coffee. I'm ordering coffee and Mountain Dew for my KSP-playing friends so they can wait alongside me.
I'm on the HYPEshuttle. It has a disturbing lack of struts. 0.24 baby!!!

Sharing is caring, besides the only thing served on the hype train is hypefood. now time to get more hype coffee!!!!

to much?
When do the devs start working?

I'll stay here alone, on the Hypetrain...

EDIT: Hypetrain is much better than the hype shuttle!

I'll stay here alone, on the Hypetrain...

*comes back to seat*

hey where did everyone go!?!

I'm on the HYPEshuttle. It has a disturbing lack of struts. 0.24 baby!!!
The HYPETrain IS the HYPEShuttle:
KSP Shuttleways Airline runs the HYPESHUTTLE. Oh boy, their food is awesome. HypeSteak on a flying SSTO as you watch Kerbin drop away below you...NOTHING can beat that!

I'll stay here alone, on the Hypetrain...

C'mon, buddy! Free transfers for everyone onboard! Complimentary 1st class and all the hype food you can eat!

The HYPETrain IS the HYPEShuttle:

http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/gNMwSTMrr7E/maxresdefault.jpg

PlotTWIST BUM BUM BUMMMMMMMM!!!!!
Hyper drive activated

When do the devs start working?

In an hour or so. Their normal hours seem to be 10:00 to 19:00.

Hyper drive activated

WOOSH! weee
Maybe we should order some pizzas for squad to show our appreciation.

Like this:

http://imgur.com/a/8K3ie

what you need there Kasper is a couple of those decoupler rockets attached to the nose to kick it up when you launch and moar boosters wouldn't hurt either.

Maybe we should order some pizzas for squad to show our appreciation.

reminds me of http://www.gameinformer.com/b/news/archive/2012/03/29/this-is-what-400-cupcakes-looks-like.aspx

...Anyone got Squad's address (and know of a decent pizza place nearby)?

reminds me of http://www.gameinformer.com/b/news/archive/2012/03/29/this-is-what-400-cupcakes-looks-like.aspx

...Anyone got Squad's address (and know of a decent pizza place nearby)?

I dunno about pizza places nearby, but it appears they have contact info on their website

http://www.squad.com.mx/SquadSite/index.htm

reminds me of http://www.gameinformer.com/b/news/archive/2012/03/29/this-is-what-400-cupcakes-looks-like.aspx

...Anyone got Squad's address (and know of a decent pizza place nearby)?

that would be the only way to get rid of that many cupcakes. and im sure the devs wouldn't mind a slice or two, but with this community they'd be muchin on pizza for months if not a year. because lets face it you guys rock in generosity, ie wackjob

that would be the only way to get rid of that many cupcakes. and im sure the devs wouldn't mind a slice or two, but with this community they'd be muchin on pizza for months if not a year. because lets face it you guys rock in generosity, ie wackjob

Fair enough, pizza for a year would be awful

I mean, the dev team is what, 10-ish people? We'd need to get like three pizzas. Not even close to the level of the Whackjob-gets-a-new-computer fund.

Fair enough, pizza for a year would be awful

I mean, the dev team is what, 10-ish people? We'd need to get like three pizzas. Not even close to the level of the Whackjob-gets-a-new-computer fund.

No we should get them a pizza better than regular pizza, *Gasp* I know! A HYPE PIZZA!!!!
